message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $10,000 is quite a bit below its value.  Could you do $13,000?
I understand your concerns, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
